page.title: 06EDUCATION 1
page.content: { { Kenton Primary School Kenton County Primary School is the only school in the village.Kenton school has four classrooms we have just got the fourth teacher who teaches the 2nd years.The building was built in 1553.It is owned by the church but rented by the local education authority. The school hours are 9.00am to 12.00 noon 1.00pm to 3.30pm.Many of our school children wear school uniform but it is not compulsory.Some parents are not in favour of school uniform until their children go to Dawlish school. At present there are 100 children at the school. { { { {
